channel.title: CVE Feed for HackerOne -- html-janitor node module
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HackerOne -- html-janitor node module

item.title: CVE-2017-0928|2024-09-17T04:04:20.635Z -- hackerone -- html-janitor%20node%20module
item.description: html-janitor node module suffers from an External Control of Critical State Data vulnerability via user-control of the '_sanitized' variable causing sanitization to be bypassed.

item.title: CVE-2017-0931|2024-09-17T03:59:01.542Z -- hackerone -- html-janitor%20node%20module
item.description: html-janitor node module suffers from a Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability via clean() accepting user-controlled values.
